name: Puzzle: Diddl
overview: In Puzzle: Diddl, the player has the opportunity to put together a new puzzle anywhere or anytime, or to continue with an already started one with 25 unique pictures. 3 difficulty levels: 63, 88 or 130 pieces. Win stars and activate new pictures. 3 player profiles. Special mode for children and beginners. Challenge yourself to complete a jigsaw puzzle against the clock
